revised_title: A New Approach to Determining the Variation of the Magnetical Compass
tldr: The author presents a new type of compass needle that mimics the behavior of a spherical loadstone, allowing for more accurate determination of compass variation. The new compass needle is created using a steel ring with brass cap and a small fleur-de-lis, which can be used to detect changes in magnetic poles similar to those observed in the Earth and loadstones.
